description:

name: Bugatti Butt Lift Short
description:
Bugatti Butt Lift Short

Reduces the waist and abdomen while lifting your natural buttocks 2 inches on each side for a firm and toned rear end. Comfortably lined with cotton for all day wear. This buttock lifter provides serious control.

**Order one size large than the chart**

name: Mazi - Exotic Print Latex Sport Cincher
description:
Item: Mazi -  Latex Sport Waist Cincher
Color: Black & White Giraffe Print

Description: #1 seller! Perfect for getting that hour glass look! Are you ready to maximize your workout with a faja style waist cinching garment? The Workout Band is a waist cincher that you wear anytime you’re going to be active. Take it to the gym or for a run outside and let it add impact to your healthy lifestyle routine. Here’s how it works. You wrap the band around your midsection. This action creates compression in your core, stimulating thermal activity and ramping up perspiration. This process allows toxins and impurities to exit the skin, while mobilizing fat cells. Put simply, the band helps ensure that your workout is working for you.  The band itself is constructed from a latex core with a soft cotton exterior and interior lining. It sits at your waist, extending to the upper abdominals. Two columns of hook-and-eye closures allow you to size the garment down with you. FelixBoning anchors the cincher and prevents migration. If you’ve been thinking about adding a supplement to your active lifestyle.


RESULTS
Midsection control
Increased thermal activity
Loss of inches reported
Mobilizes fat cells
Stimulates perspiration


FEATURES
Latex workout band
Hook-and-eye closures
FlexiBoning
Cotton lining


Choose size by going by your waist size & your fitted shirt with no stretch. If you need a consultation, please email me.

The "Vette" sport waist cincher , has double hook-and-eye closure, made with latex that helps to control and slim the waistline, abdomen and back instantly. This is the perfect choice for you if your goal is to slim down back fat & bra rolls during exercise.

Description: #1 seller! Perfect for getting that hour glass look! Are you ready to maximize your workout with a faja style waist cinching garment? The Workout Band is a waist cincher that you wear anytime you’re going to be active. Take it to the gym or for a run outside and let it add impact to your healthy lifestyle routine. Here’s how it works. Once you cinch yourself into your vest the latex action creates compression in your core, stimulating thermal activity and ramping up perspiration.
